title: Bigger Than The Block
description: An in-person program for system or justice impacted youth providing key support to achieve outlined professional & personal goals, work readiness & digital literacy training and connection to employment opportunities.

title: 1:1 Technical Mentorship Program
description: A virtual mentorship program providing free access to three learning tracks of technical education, resources,Â  a safe community, and employment placement opportunities to formerly incarcerated and those impacted by the criminal legal system.

title: Leadership Apprentice Program
description: A fellowship that gives real-world experience embedded on Emergent Works' engineering team. Through collaborations with the engineering team & clients, fellows learn data literacy, product development, project management, digital literacy, and remote collaboration, culminating in a client project or feature that they own.
